text: "Discothèque" is a 1997 song by Irish rock band U2. It is the lead single from their ninth studio album Pop. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, New Zealand, Finland, Ireland, Italy, Norway, number 2 in Canada and number 10 in the United States. ==Track listings== * UK and European CD single # "Discothèque" – 5:08 # "Holy Joe" (Garage Mix) – 4:21 # "Holy Joe" (Guilty Mix) – 5:09 * US 12-inch single :A1. "Discothèque" (DM Deep Club Mix) – 6:58 :A2. "Discothèque" (Hexidecimal Mix) – 7:21 :B1. "Discothèque" (DM Deep Instrumental Mix) – 6:58 :B2. "Discothèque" (radio edit) – 4:34 == References == Category:1997 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Alternative dance songs
title: Discothèque (song)
